refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gimp_md5_get_digest ()
refsect2.para: This function is deprecated! Use GChecksum from GLib instead.
Get the md5 hash of a buffer. The result is put in the 16 bytes buffer digest. For more information see RFC 1321.

listitem.simpara: buffer size (in bytes) or -1 if buffer is nul-terminated.
16 bytes buffer receiving the hash code.
